Pre-Game Insights: India comes into the T20 World Cup looking to end their unlucky pattern of near misses in ICC events
USA now only need a win from their final two games to confirm Super Eight qualification
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game takes place at Nassau International Cricket Stadium on Long Island, New York
Cricket fans in the US and Canada can watch every ball of the 2024 T20 World Cup live on WillowTV
Others: The match will be held on Wednesday, June 12, 2024
The encounter gets under way at 10:30 a.m. local time (ET) in New York
